lines: 1. Emeremo ekoeratwamboke nyancha ng'umbu,Nindor' emambi'engiya y'obonene;Nimomany' Omotoriako ndaike aria Igoro,Nankwanie n'omogokoOmonene.
Nimomanye, nimomanye,Ko ndatenene ang'e as'are.Nimomanye, Nimomanye,Kondarore amabok' aye.
2. Naki ndagoke monoko ndarore Nyasae,Kondaror' obosiobway'obwororo;Nimobake as' obwanchanin'obuya bwonsi,Bwandoseiri' obomenyoaria igoro.
3. Abanchani baito bonsiabakure as'ens'aye,Bakwete n'okwegenakwa Nyasae,Natogoke mono koumeran'aria igoro;Ko ninganie kororaYeso kubua.
4. Kondasoe omochienechianga chindabu,Nandae as'emechando etari;Nintere n'omogokon'ababuir'ebibe,Ko Ninganie kororaYeso koua.
